Title: The President's Fitness Test
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Adam F. Goldberg (creator), Chris Bishop, Kristopher Valentine (staff writer), Aaron Kaczander
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Murray (Jeff Garlin) intervenes when Adam (Sean Giambrone) seeks Beverly's (Wendi McLendon-Covey) help to avoid a national physical fitness test. Barry (Troy Gentile) woos Erica's (Hayley Orrantia) French pen pal (guest star Bella Dayne).
